reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Preventing sexual abuse of boys

description.narrative: WHAT: Work against child abuse by educating, producing information material and campaigning. An outreach programme for support and counselling as well as peer support groups are being established. WHY: Sexual abuse of young boys is a taboo in Cambodia. The victims seldom have an access to psychosocial support, which increases the risk of marginalization. The project aims in decreasing abuse and helping victims to safely re-integrate in the society.RESULTS: Local communities become aware of the ongoing sexua l abuse of young boys. The victims get an access for relevant support. BENEFICIARIES: Victims of sexual abuse, other NGOs, social workers. PARTNER: First Step
